title: Bloomberg Markets: Pimco Bucks Trend by Raising Fees
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Pimco Bucks Trend by Raising Fees
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Margaret Collins "Peggy" US Investing Team Leader/Personal Finance Reporter Bloomberg News Discussing Pimco Income Fund, the fastest-growing actively managed U.S. mutual fund, is raising fees at a time most money managers are racing to slash costs paid by investors
